summary: Changes the relation between Stamina and Carrying Weight from the original 5 to 50 (per 10 stamina) when you raise your Stamina.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the relation between Stamina and Carrying Weight from the original 5 to 50 (per 10 stamina)

Just drop it on your data folder and activate it like any other mod :)

Mod (still) doesn\'t work retroactively. I may find what enables it so, maybe not.
author: Razi the Dragon
